full_text: List of Materials: Scheepjes Colour Crafter (100% Premium Acrylic; 100g/300m) • Yarn A: 1026 Lelystad x 1 ball • Yarn B: 1114 Eindhoven x 1 ball • Yarn C: 1709 Burum x 1 ball • Yarn D: 1820 Goes x 1 ball • Yarn E: 1722 Alphen x 1 ball • Yarn F: 1062 Dordrecht x 1 ball 3mm knitting needles Stitch markers 5 foam blocks 10x10x10cm Measurements Single Motif measures 10x10cm (4x4in) after blocking. Build Your Name Blocks is part of Pretty Little Things, Issue 02 - TOYS, which is available in print via Scheepjes Retailers and as a digital download (eBook).
name: Ravelry: Build Your Name Blocks pattern by Michelle Oonincx
